ORDER terminating 12 Letter Motion for Extension of Time to Answer. Pursuant to the Court's Individual Rules, the filing of a pre-motion conference request letter regarding a proposed motion to dismiss stays the deadline for the requesting party to move or answer. See Rule 2(A). Accordingly, the relief Defendant is seeking in its letter is unnecessary. So Ordered. (Signed by Judge Andrew L. Carter, Jr on 3/23/2017) (anc) (Entered: 03/23/2017)

ORDER. As discussed during the pre-motion conference held today, Plaintiff is granted leave to amend the Complaint and must do so on or before April 12, 2017. Additionally, Defendant is granted leave to move to dismiss the Amended Complaint. The Court sets the following briefing schedule: Defendant's Motion to Dismiss: May 11, 2017. Plaintiff's Opposition: June 12, 2017. Defendant's Reply, if any: June 26, 2017. In the meantime, the parties should engage in discovery. Document discovery must be completed by May 5, 2017. The parties should submit a joint status report to the Court on June 12, 2017. SO ORDERED. (Amended Pleadings due by 4/12/2017. Discovery due by 5/5/2017. Motions due by 5/11/2017. Responses due by 6/12/2017. Replies due by 6/26/2017.) (Signed by Judge Andrew L. Carter, Jr on 4/5/2017) (rjm) (Entered: 04/05/2017)

ORDER granting 41 Letter Motion for Conference ; granting 42 Letter Motion for Conference. The pre-motion conference scheduled for December 19, 2017 at 10:00 a.m. is ADJOURNED. Plaintiff's request to file a motion for summary judgment and Defendant's request to file a motion to dismiss are GRANTED. The Court sets the following briefing schedule for Plaintiff's motion for summary judgment and Defendant's motion to dismiss: Opening Brief: January 16, 2018, Opposition Brief: February 13, 2018, Reply, if any: February 27, 2018. The Clerk of Court is kindly requested to terminate the letter motions at ECF Nos. 41 and 42. SO ORDERED. (Signed by Judge Andrew L. Carter, Jr on 12/18/2017) (rj) Modified on 2/16/2018 (rj).
